body_html:
I get this same issue with cudnn 7.3, Cuda 10, Windows 10, Python 3.7, Anaconda 5.3 (after solving two other unrelated issues involving bazel's repository_ctx.execute not being able to find grep or patch).

@blaueck @Tvde1 How do you specify to use VS2017?

@blaueck @Tvde1  How do you specify to use VS2017?
